body: Hi, i want to share and ask for advice. I´m using Ladybug and HoneyBee to evaluate 3 diferent buildings as part of an analysis for my Thesis in my Master in Sustainable Architecture. The objective it´s to compare comfort and energy efficience between a modern small conventional house built by commun developers, a tradicional vernacular mayan house and a prototype that i design. I think the small housing protptye deffinition its working but i dont´t know if my results  are correct. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sL*8Qi6E-Ox3Qil5G6YjcZ8OpqmP6wuOOetM6fHDd7lnrcJnMFOs1CQDkIQ8zet9XQvjN6*gtYAEPcp-1ax0x--yknBxpaXY/SmallHouseanalysis.png) I don´t know if the windows are working properly, and i want to use a custom block material for the walls. [Comp%20Small%20Housing.gh](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sL*8Qi6E-Oz54mfnmsEtA7BBJ99gT4OEUuHgZniPKLrNk074W3A*v5pAnb8tu3KMeX8dOTpv*gskhqVnL0mLDOXxVnE2DUbu/CompSmallHousing.gh) In this other analysis for the mayan house, i´m having trouble with the zones, i think that´s because of the complexity of the roof shape. [Comp%20Mayan%20House.gh](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sL*8Qi6E-OwfLAFbA9Jx08vrPS4N7P0jIxS9*ArVNGyDozA0zU5HziLl5RMxjE8ioQhCjEhdxDuy7abNUtEB7wwW1qMUMKZt/CompMayanHouse.gh) Do you have any sugestions? And if some one have an idea for how i can present the coparitions and what are the benefits.
